siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览国外股票社区里的热门讨论

blogPost.title: Tesla was the best performing stock in the S&P 500 last year by a wide margin (note: Tesla did not join the S&P 500 until 12/21). $TSLA https://t.co/5d49MTA3lk
blogPost.author: Charlie Bilello

localize.full_text: 特斯拉是去年标准普尔500指数中表现最好的股票，遥遥领先(注：特斯拉直到12/21才加入标准普尔500指数)。https://t.co/5d49MTA3lk美国电话服务级别协议
特斯拉是去年標準普爾500指數中表現最好的股票，遙遙領先(注：特斯拉直到12/21才加入標準普爾500指數)。https://t.co/5d49MTA3lk美國電話服務級別協議

previous.excerpt:
https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2021-01-02/tesla-delivers-499-550-electric-cars-in-2020-just-shy-of-target?srnd=premium

As the title and the article says - Tesla delivered ~180k cars in q4 and were
just shy of 500k delivered cars for 2020.

Without exerting my bias, I'm wondering how you…
previous.title: Tesla Delivers 499,550 Vehicles in 2020, Just Shy of Target

localize.title: 特斯拉2020年交付499,550辆汽车，略低于目标
localize.the_new_excerpt:
https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2021-01-02/tesla-delivers-499-550-electric-cars-in-2020-just-shy-of-target?srnd=premium

正如标题和文章所说-特斯拉在第四季度交付了约18万辆汽车，并
2020年交付的汽车略低于50万辆。

恕我直言，我想知道你是如何…的

localize.title: 特斯拉2020年交付499,550輛汽車，略低於目標
localize.the_new_excerpt:
https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2021-01-02/tesla-delivers-499-550-electric-cars-in-2020-just-shy-of-target?srnd=premium

正如標題和文章所說-特斯拉在第四季度交付了約18萬輛汽車，並
2020年交付的汽車略低於50萬輛。

恕我直言，我想知道你是如何…的
